projects.title: GlobePlotter (collab)
projects.description: GlobePlotter offers users a semi-curated trip planning experience. It also provides users with a checklist of activities for each trip they create, and a retrospective view of trips they have completed.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Weather Dashboard allows users to search for a city and find its current and five-day forecasts. Previous searches are recorded and displayed, and the UI updates according to the time of day in the current city's timezone.

projects.title: Employee Directory
projects.description: Employee Directory allows the user to filter and sort through a directory of personnel based on different criteria. Information for each user is presented in a table with rows dynamically generated using React.

projects.title: Note Taker
projects.description: Note taker allows users to save and delete notes. The notes are saved to a db.json file, and the application is deployed via an express server.

projects.title: Song in the Life
projects.description: Song in the Life allows users to search for a song, and learn a little bit more about its context in time. Some of the information returned includes the album, the album art, the artist, and a random fact from the year of its release.

projects.title: Team Builder
projects.description: Team Builder uses templates and user input to generate an html file displaying information about team personnel. This is a CLI application that takes user input and then generates html at the end of the process.
